content: I feel like a total dope asking but I cannot find Pulse. If I choose “write and article” does this mean it’s on Pulse? Or is there some distinct platform within LinkedIn that is called Pulse I need to navigate to and publish there? While I am asking noob questions, when I finally find Pulse, are you saying that I can take my Medium posts, add a paragraph stating that it is republished, and repost anything I’ve already put on Medium? Thanks — this has been a real confusing point for me.
